title: ilsetopf
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cozy small restaurant with vegan options including bruschetta "Romana" with tomato-basil, a weekly changing vegetable soup (ask if it´s vegan),  mixed salad with croutons or fried vegetables; roasted potatoes with mushrooms and salad (ask for no fried egg), tarte flambée with mushrooms and tomato sauce instead of crème fraîche (not on the chart but can be ordered spontaneously), pizza funghi with fresh mushrooms and homemade pizza dough (ask for no cheese) (no longer on the chart but possible upon pre-order 1 day in advance for at least 2 pizzas). Vegetarian options are marked with a red V.
